verbs.description: Republicans [V: have] been demanding a look at documents about whether Obama planted a spy in the Trump campaign .
Republicans have [V: been] demanding a look at documents about whether Obama planted a spy in the Trump campaign .
[ARG0: Republicans] have been [V: demanding] [ARG1: a look at documents about whether Obama planted a spy in the Trump campaign] .
Republicans have been demanding a look at documents about whether [ARG0: Obama] [V: planted] [ARG1: a spy] [ARG2: in the Trump campaign] .
